website_summaries.verdict: The disappointing Fujifilm FinePix S1000fd is small but not pocketable, complicated but not compelling. Decent noise control is the highlight, but there's nothing else to write home about with a camera that wants to be the best of both worlds, and ends up simply wanting

customer_reviews.title: 10,000 pictures and it still works like I want it to
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera over 10 years, and it works well as my work camera. Whether it's leisure photography, or criminal investigation, this has been one dependable camera. It is what it is. However, I do not like the digital zoom mechanism at all, because you can never figure out beforehand how the actual zoom pictures will turn out. But its a camera that doesn't cost 10 bills either, so if something breaks, and can't be repaired (not my experience at all), a replacement would be cheap enough!
customer_reviews.author: DRYWASHER-BILL

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm Finepix #1000
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Researched Fuji for their latest economical high optical zoom cameras to use in conjunction with my old Finepix 3800 which takes remarkable pictures. Well, the S1000 is even better - the zoom is phenomenall - the details and the colors - when compared side by side with my 3800 are even better. I shopped for best price and free shipping but of course always end up at Amazon.com for the best deal. I am still on a learning curve as it is quite different from the 3800 but the manual that came with it is fairly easy to read. I highly recommend this model and Fuji!
customer_reviews.author: Marci Carberry

customer_reviews.title: really good camera
customer_reviews.text: this is a really good camera. it has a lot of features and takes really high resolution and clear pictures. the pictures are too large for my purposes, hard to manage online, but i confess i have not really looked into how to change the settings, and suspect i could shrink it by asking for lower resolution. the panorama ability is really fun. i would definitely buy this product agian. this is my second Fuji camera. i loved the first one, but was robbed. my next camera will be a Fuji, i am very pleased with this companies products.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie R. Mashni

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Pictures!
customer_reviews.text: I currently have a Canon PowerShot A630. At 8.0 megapixels it shoots great ---- or so I thought! I bought the Fujifilm Finepix for my roomate as a Christmas present. Now I wish I had of bought it for myself. 2 megapixels make one hell of a difference! My roomate is a true photo amateur but the pics that she produces with the Finepix are just fabulous. The Finepix is less expensive than the Canon too! If you are looking for a great point and shoot camera for yourself or anyone else, you can't go wrong with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Reg 59

customer_reviews.title: fujifilm finefix s1000fd digital camer
customer_reviews.text: I liked this one so much that when i botched it re my error, I went for another fuji, the S4500. I took the 1000 apart and may come back to this review if I ever can fix the thing . But to have a shop fix it costs more than a new one, at least a different model. Last time I looked these used could be found, amazon and ebay for like $50. I almost got one instead of the 4500. Great little camera.
customer_reviews.author: Don Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. I am not a photographer but a Graphic designer. I needed a camera better than the mini point and shoot type but not a SLR. This camera is a great bridge between the two levels. It has an auto mode so my technophobe wife can use it, but it also has some advanced controls so I can get the shots I need for my job. One of the features I liked was the macro and super macro so I can shoot objects close up. This camera is a perfect fit for the intermediate non pro. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon R. Combs

customer_reviews.title: dollar for dollar it can't be beat
customer_reviews.text: After extended research the Fujifilm Finepix S1000fd seemed to be a great camera....and it definitely is. The variety of functions make it a fine, versatile camera. I took it on vacation shortly after receipt and I found it every bit as good as cameras costing much more. I made a presentation from the photos taken on vacation and the viewers were amazed at the quality. Dollar for dollar I would recommend this camera to anyone as an easy-to-use camera that is as versatile as any I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: W. Schult

customer_reviews.title: Great Value...Lots of Features!
customer_reviews.text: A friend bought a earlier version of this Fuji digital camera and it left a lasting impression...I finally bought mine after pricing around the web. This is an excellent camera for the price, great resolution, and it also shoots video clips! I purchased an 8GB video card on Amazon and it lets me shoot tons of stills and video. You will be hard pressed to find a better deal than what you will pay at Amazon...Plus you can get FREE 2-Day shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Ed P. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera Fujifilm
customer_reviews.text: This camera is awsome. Takes really great pictures , has all the features you could possibly want. Does a really good job with movies also. This is the first camera I have purchased in about 10 years or more. It couldn't be easier operation. The zoom on this thing is incredible. You could almost make a thimble look the size of a garbage can. Maybe a bit of a stretch. But you get the Idea. I am well pleased with my Purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L. Greer

customer_reviews.title: Bad bad bad flash did not work and never anywhere ...
customer_reviews.text: Bad bad bad flash did not work and never anywhere in the description did they mention that. It doesn’t even deserve one star. I didn’t even ge tiny money back.
customer_reviews.author: Christabella S.

customer_reviews.title: Camera Tyro - seems cool but don't know what half the stuff does
customer_reviews.text: This is the first actual camera I've owned since I received a Kodak Instamatic from my Aunt at first communion in 1976. I know nothing about cameras, though as a physicist, I know a little bit about optics. I've taken some nice pictures and some bad pictures with this camera. Leaving it set to auto does a good job. When I've played around manually with the shutter speed and f-stop (as well as trying the natural light setting) I haven't had that great of results. I'm sure that's more a result of my inexperience than anything lacking with the camera. Still feels like it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Pehrson

customer_reviews.title: Great Photos, Bad Video
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera back in 2008 and it's still working perfectly, I am extremely satisfied with it, sometimes it takes a couple of second to take a picture but the results are really really good, the only bad thing is that the video quality is really bad, only 460x320, I can't blame the camera since I bought it without knowing this, so just take it into consideration if you're going to be filming a lot with it. So bad video, but excellent product hardware and great pictures, many features and very good zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Ricardo Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: It was a great camera gave it to a relative years ago and it still works!
customer_reviews.author: G S.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous camera, was stolen within 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: This camera was a gift for my aspiring 15 year old photographer daughter's birthday. Unfortunately, it was stolen, along with her mp3 player while we were out to dinner celebrating my 14 year old son's birthday two weeks later. She is heartbroken, and I am even more so, because I went over budget to get this in the first place and she was so excited and thrilled with it. It is an amazing camera for the price though, and simple enough for a novice to figure out and use. I bought the extra memory card for it, and rechargeable batteries, but if you run out of batteries, you can just use regular ones.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Knox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of fun with this camera, it came with everything you need to make great photos..
customer_reviews.author: Norman C. Yeagle

customer_reviews.title: Fuji Finepix
customer_reviews.text: We are an engineering firm that does forensic investigations. We just bought two of these cameras, primarily because of the 12X zoom. The cameras are replacing two Konica Minolta cameras that had a 10X zoom, but have not lasted very long, probably because they are often used under extreme conditions, such as hot attics, in the snow and rain, getting bumped while climbing a ladder, etc. Our engineers prefer this camera over the older ones because of the larger zoom ratio, bigger screen size and better feel. Photo quality has been excellent. Time will tell in regard to durability.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome intermediate camera! My daughter is taking a photography class in high school and this camera is perfect. It has both automatic and manual settings and boh are easy to navigate. It takes crisp clear pictures. This camera is an excellent value for someone who wants to go beyond the point and shoot camera, but doesn't need a full on SLR.
customer_reviews.author: IMPhoto

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm Finfix S1000fd 10MP Digital Camera 12X Optical Zoom
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I bought a Fujifilm, but not the last! It is really a great little SLR. Great pictures and features for a very low price. To make the flash work, you have to push a button. I LOVE that manual flash. Did you ever shoot inside, where you have to set the camera to turn off the flash ....and then the camera shuts off....and you have to set the camera to turn off the flash again? Not a problem here! The only thing negative (pardon the pun) is the cheep shoulder strap that comes with the camera. Mel
customer_reviews.author: Mel P

customer_reviews.title: Love Fuji again!!
customer_reviews.text: I have another Fujifilm camera that has been all over the world with me... including Iraq. It held up wonderfully, so I decided to give this one a shot and so far so good! I am surely not disappointed. I would recommend this camera to someone who wants to bump up from a basic digital - without getting into SLRs.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had an earlier Finepix S-5000 (3Mpx) and took some of my most satisfying photos with that camera. When the sensor died, I looked for a replacement and settled on the S1000fd based on reviews and features for the value. So much for value. My biggest disappointment has been pure and simple image quality. It looks good on the camera, but when processed in Photoshop for effects or enlargements, the pixel quality is the worse I've seen. Maybe I just got a bad one, but I'm to the point of looking into returning it if at all possible.
customer_reviews.author: JJeff

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Fujifilm S5500, an excellent camera. My only concern about the S1000fd is that I've been getting more noise (grainy) in indoor pics that I did with my previous camera. Meanwhile outdoor photos have been consistently crisp, clear, good color balance, etc. I upgraded primarily for the Sport Mode with a faster shutter speed. I've taken several hundred pics of fast moving toddlers, and I've been very pleased with the results; some noise notwithstanding. All in all, an excellent camera - especially at its price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this camera to take pictures of my daughter whom was born 15 weeks early and is in a incubator. it took some playing with the different options to find the best mode to use, but finally settled on the flower setting. i must say, i personally have never taken a better picture. i give this a 4 because i love it, i would have given it a 5 except i can see how some people may have issues with finding the best setting, but for the money, this is a nice camera.
customer_reviews.author: Adam W. Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! Does a great job. Zoom works well and gets very detailed pictures. There is a lot to learn so plan on taking some time and reading the manual but it is well worth it. The pictures are quite big so make sure and have space to save them. I am glad I got the 2 gb memory card.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Low Light Quality
customer_reviews.text: Regarding the FujiFilm FinePix S1000 fd, perhaps it is that I am not using the correct settings, but I don't find Low light pictures to my desired expectation. The pictures, although fairly sharp, are not homogeneously bright; there are shades of dullness. It does not measure up to the Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H20 under similar conditions, in terms of sharpness and brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Gordon

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: my camera arrived sooner than estimated whic is awesome. I bought this camera to take pictures of te animals at the animal shelter. It works great. I am still figuring out all the options, but all the pictures I have taken (198)have come out great. The owners manual is very descriptive. Although a little intimidating for me since I don't know too much about cameras, but I am a fast learner. I would highly reccomend this to anyone looking for a digital camera.
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm Finepix S1000fd
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the 12x zoom. I am now able to take long range pix that are clear and sharp. Another thing I truly love about this camera is the length of time the batteries last. I took Hundreds (aprox 600) before I needed to replace the batteries, that is awewome.
customer_reviews.author: ShirleyAnn

customer_reviews.title: S1000fd camera
customer_reviews.text: I searched a lot after my almost new digital camera that I never liked, because everything was difficult even closing the battery compartment, died and no parts available :>(. The Fugifilm Finepix S1000fd is easy to understand, physically friendly and is loaded with features. I price compared and the value is outstanding too.
customer_reviews.author: dbmac111

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera.
customer_reviews.text: The camera is great. Takes great pictures and very easy to use. Might be my most cost effective purchase from amazon ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Agresta

customer_reviews.title: fujifilm finepix S1000fd
customer_reviews.text: Camera arrived quickly and the price was great! I've encountered no problems with the camera and realize it has great potential for very artful work, as the zoom range is fantastic. I wish it had an anti shake feature, especially for my wife for whom I purchased it, but no complaints so far. I also wish it gave battery life indication before it's so late in usable battery life. Still, it's a fine small camera.
customer_reviews.author: rotometer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for the price
customer_reviews.text: If you like the style of the traditional cameras (and not the usual small "cigarette-box" size) or just don't want to spend a lot on a professional device, this is right for you. Enjoy the great quality from a known brand (Fuji), take pictures in many customized formats or record your own videos with sound. This is my 3rd Fuji camera and they keep on doing things better everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Blandon

customer_reviews.title: Bought this awhile back. You would have to spend ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this awhile back. You would have to spend a lot more money to jump to the next grade.
customer_reviews.author: KhanBuryKhan

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but good!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! I've seen others that are far larger and more expensive that don't take near the quality of photos- and videos! Recently during my daughter's musical, no flash cameras allowed. This camera did awesome under low light conditions. Many extra features with keep me interested for a long time learning and using!!
customer_reviews.author: Allen H.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, high quality photos
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this camera for us about a month ago and we've been very pleased with it. It has the right amount of flexibility for almost any purpose but the complexity level isn't too much for novice users. Good low-light response, though our pictures tend to come out a bit yellow if we don't add more white light. My only real complaint is that the image stabilization is lacking-to-nonexistent, which leads to quite a few blurry images unless you use a tripod or some other manual stabilization.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter K.

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I am a new gramma and love this camera. It is so easy to use and takes the best shots (you should see the 1 hour old pictures!) Could not ask for a better camera. I have had 2 digital cameras in the past and this is by far the most superior.
customer_reviews.author: PJM

customer_reviews.title: Camera Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really like the camera it came as described and works great. As a novice photographer this camera is more than I could have wished for, it is fast and takes great pictures. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chief

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera and great value!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I made a mistake by purchasing the Kingston 2 meg card. This camera tries to send too much data to a regular card. You need to get a high speed SD card to utilize this fantastic camera to it's fullest. I hope this helps you if you purchase this excellent deal! Dave
customer_reviews.author: DMS

customer_reviews.title: Picture Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this camera, it certainly out performs the 3mp Olympus that I brought with me from Australia. Photos are clear even when taken in poor light without flash. So far have only taken around 350 shots at a wedding last weekend and extremely happy with the results. Would I recomend this camera?? YES! Delivery was fast, well packaged and price was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Peewee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Seller and Camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the ultimate point and click camera!!! The zoom is just incredible and operation is at the simplest level. I couldn't be happier with this Fuji camera and the seller was just the BEST!!!
customer_reviews.author: N. Smith

customer_reviews.title: BK of Delaware
customer_reviews.text: Amazon delivered quickly as always. This is a nice camera with a lot of capabilities and nicely priced. The set-ups for special effects take time to learn. When I discovered Fuji did not have a written hard-copy Owner's Manual available for me to take on field trips, I found it very disappointing. (The Owner's Manual is on a CD.)Consequently I've returned the camera for refund.
customer_reviews.author: W. B. KING

customer_reviews.title: Bad on Batteries and flash pictures
customer_reviews.text: Camera goes through lots of batteries and when using flash has a tendency to lock up and then you lose the picture
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Fuji finepix s1000fd
customer_reviews.text: I waited a long time to enter the digital photography arena, I use a 35mm SLR and never thought a digital could compare. Well, this one does, the instructions are easy to understand, it operates as advertised, the picture quality is amazing, features are useful and fun to use. The accompanying FinePix viewer is good, and the user manuel on CD provides extra hints and instructions for use. I would recommend this product to anyone interested in owning a digital camera.
customer_reviews.author: M. Voorhees

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: It is an excellent camera for the price. Picture quality is good. You can not put filters on it, and the delay between pushing the shutter button and the taking of the picture is annoying at best. These are things common in this price range and you have to spend more to get more.
customer_reviews.author: gwleader

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. Little bit of lag in shutter speed ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Little bit of lag in shutter speed and if the sun is over bright, it over compensates and the pictures are way too dark. But takes great photos. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dSparks

customer_reviews.title: Best Camera I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This camera is unser friendly if you have some knowledge of cameras. If not, it will probably take an hour of fideting to get it, but once you do its worth it. I have been through my fair share of digital cameras and this one by far our performs them all. The pictures are crisp and clear and the super macro setting is insanely good. It can focus up to 0.8 in!d Its lightweight and may be a little smaller than you may expect but its handy and quick. I love this camera! Ive had it for a week or two now and its still running strong on the batteries it came with.
customer_reviews.author: E. Cash

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm FinePix s1000fd
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this camera. I was wanting a camera that would do a little more than just point and shoot and this camera does it. A few features that I'm not so happy are that there is no image stablization with the continous shooting so images can turn out pretty blurry if you're not holding very still. Using the camera with a tripod would probably solve this problem. Overall I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. E. Short

customer_reviews.title: FujiFilm Camera
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the camera for a little while, but it seems to be exactly what I wanted. I do have alot to learn about it. I bought a 4gb SD card for it and I was very surprised at how many pictures that it would hold. Like 780 or so even when I'm using the 10mp setting. All in all, I love the camera!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela N. Coffee

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a simple digital camera with lots of options easy to use, this is the one. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Lenny Mom

customer_reviews.title: Professional Quality for a Novice
customer_reviews.text: For a beginning photographer it's more than what you need. Granted, it's not a SLR camera where you cannot switch lenses of your choosing, but if you want to learn the basics with many options and quality of both pictures and design, this camera is more then acceptable for a novice.
customer_reviews.author: Paul N. Hassett

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is an astounding buy! Takes great pics, and the zoom is amazing. LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Culp

customer_reviews.title: Technical dream camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this digital camera for my son, who loves the camera. The ability to "stich" panoramic views, the auto-stabilization feature, 10 MP, and the 12X zoom make this camera much more than most camers at its price. A great buy forless than $200.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell D. Felps

customer_reviews.title: Fuji Finepix S1000fd
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera to replace an S700 I had about a year and never did really like. The S1000FD has more zoom, more megapixels, larger LCD and many more features and is still smaller than the clunky S700.
customer_reviews.author: Lovell K. Henson

customer_reviews.title: Picture perfact
customer_reviews.text: this is one of the simpilest camaras to run and it takes good pictrues too, the seller was right about it in the discribtion and it was priced just right for what i wanted to spend on a quaility camara
customer_reviews.author: Darrell F. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Better for the price!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, saved $100.00 over retail locally, plus the features are just amazing for such a small camera. Only complaint is the lack of a touch screen, nonetheless, one of the best cameras around.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: "Excellente Item, this camera have lots of modes! really easy to setup some of the basic funtions.. the P mode help a lot for better pix, the N mode for natural light is amazing, everything is perfect on it... it size is awesome!!! great prices, for a good piece!"
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: 18 months with camera
customer_reviews.text: I loved my camera (purchased March 2009) and it took beautiful pictures. I bought my last Fuji camera in 2000 for a trip to the Amazon and it still works. This product is now dead! It will not work other than to turn on and immediately stop doing anything. I had to take batteries out and put them back in to get it to turn off. To fix it would cost almost my original price so won't be doing that. 18 months is a very short lifetime compared to the cameras I still have. So, my new camera is not a Fuji
customer_reviews.author: Penny Smith

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but died quickly with common problem
customer_reviews.text: This camera had good features except for the baterries, but I didnt get to explore it completeley as the camera had a fatal flaw. It died within a week with a common problem from Fuji cameras. The electronci lens stopped opening and caused a system error. As I searched, this appears to be a somewhat common problem with Fuji cameras so I dont plan to get another. Kudos to Amazon, though. Return and refund were processed quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Nasha

customer_reviews.title: Does everything we need it to do.
customer_reviews.text: So far, it has proved durable and portable and has many different features, more than we will ever use. Takes really nice pictures, but the batteries do not seem to last long (requires 4 AA batteries).
customer_reviews.author: C. Gifford

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This was a great find! I bought if for my boyfriend for his birthday. I had previously owned this model but lost it on vacation. SO glad I'm reunited with this great camera!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany K.

customer_reviews.title: camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a replacement for an older one. I have been very pleased with the camera on all accounts.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya T. Justus

customer_reviews.title: GOOD CAMERA GOOD PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE HAD THE FUJI FOR A COULPE OF WEEKS AND REALLY LIKE IT . IT FEELS GOOD IN YOUR HAND AND LOOKS GREAT. TAKES GOOD PIXS, EASY TO OPERATE,MANY FEATURES,SOME I AM STILL LEARNING ABOUT.CAN'T BEAT THE PRICE FOR A CAMERA LIKE THIS,AND GOT A FREE MEMORY CARD TOO.
customer_reviews.author: H. B. Kennell

customer_reviews.title: Fuji Finepix digital camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas Gift and has not yet been used, but I have and older one that is only 10X optical and is a wonderful camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: L. Faye Lescalleet

customer_reviews.title: dropped in the mud?
customer_reviews.text: The camera was purchased for parts for a pristine unit that I have. I was disappointed with the missing lens-cap and it appears as if the camera was dropped in mud. Hmmmm.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Lowell

customer_reviews.title: Canera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for someone else but he said it is a great camera. I saw some of the pictures he took and they looked really good.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Dean Brubaker

customer_reviews.title: works great for the age of this model
customer_reviews.text: works great for the age of this model. i bought this used to replace one that fried its motherboard while i was enrolled in a photog class. great image quality. the user manual can be found by searching online in search engines.
customer_reviews.author: voscheTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: More Bang For The Buck!
customer_reviews.text: When I was looking for a dependable camera that didn't break the bank, nor sacrificing the qualities. I found this camera. I have had no problems with this particular model. I could go on and on, and such...but take my word for it, this camera is a good one. I am pleased with it. Glad I found it on www.amazon.com!
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Takes excellent pics, I am an outdoors person
customer_reviews.text: Takes excellent pics, I am an outdoors person, hunt, fish etc...Camera could not handle temp changes, I think condensation got inside. I think its only good for birthday party's, don't recommend if you want to take outdoor pics, unless you are a fair weather person, now I use my Galaxy S4, works great in all weather. So if you want an excellent video of your kids 1st B-day, this is the camera for you.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Archer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. For the price youcan't beat it. Great picture quality and simple to use plus gives you manual capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Redd

customer_reviews.title: fujifilm finepix camera
customer_reviews.text: this camera is great, you can do so much with it, I would get this item again, and tell a friend about it, easy to use and just a great all around nice camera.
customer_reviews.author: narrell soule

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great pictures my family and I love it. The sport function for taking action shots s great
customer_reviews.author: K. Durham

customer_reviews.title: great price, great camera
customer_reviews.text: its a great camera. Very good quality, the 12x zoom is awesome for far away shots. I am glad i bought this camera, I would recommend to friends for sure
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: amazon and fujifilm S1000fd camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera based on limited use seems to be a well engineered item. I would much prefer a complete written instruction book though rather than the supplied cd in pdf format. My opinion of Amazon though now stinks. I got the camera on 9/17/08. As of 10/6/08, the price has been cut twice by a total of $20 and they refuse to credit me the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm Finepix S1000fd 10MP
customer_reviews.text: Fujifilm Finepix S1000fd 10MP Digital Camera with 12x Optical Zoom Camera is hard to manage, close ups almost impossible , quality is just not there.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar L. Aguillon

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera based on other people's review, I guess I was wrong to listen to the opinion of others because this camera sucks. I took it on a trip to Florida and the quality was horrible and the zoom did not even work. I've purchased many expensive camera(s) such as Nikon and I have to admit, don't go cheap because cheap doesn't always offer you good quality photo's. I will never buy another Fuji camera or another cheap one, because it's just not worth my time or value. Lastly, I returned the camera and Amazon was amazing at refunding the full amount I paid for the camera with no problem what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I've had other Fuji cameras and I was always happy with them. But this one turned out a complete dud. I played around with it for a week, tweaking the colors and exposure (I'm an experienced photographer) but it always looked like a child had crayoned in the colors. I returned the camera. Go with the Canon Powershot S3 or S5.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Vicente

product_meta.title: Fujifilm FinePix S Series S1000fd 10.0 MP Digital Camera - Black
product_meta.description:
Fuji Finepix S1000FD Digital Camera

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


 Perfect for advanced amateur photographers who want an affordable, step-up digital camera, the 10-megapixel FinePix S1000fd builds on the legacy of the FinePix S700 with the addition of a Fujinon 12x optical zoom lens (33mm-396mm equivalent) for greater range and flexibility, Fujifilm’s proprietary Face Detection Technology with Automatic Red Eye Removal, and a brand new Panoramic Shooting mode. 

Finepix S1000fd Highlights 

Face Detection with Automatic Red Eye Removal Face Detection operates by identifying and prioritizing up to 6 faces in a framed scene, and then adjusting the focus and exposure accordingly to ensure the sharpness and clarity of human subjects in the picture, regardless of background. After a shot is captured each detected face is instantly checked for red eye; if it is found, it is corrected automatically, saving the time-consuming process of fixing it later. 



1) Face in sharp focus, 2) Optimized brightness 

Panorama Shooting mode For catching beautiful scenery or very large groups, the new Panorama Shooting mode makes it easy to create impressive panoramic photos. This mode captures and combines a maximum of three consecutive shots at 3 megapixel resolution each, which are saved to the memory card as a panoramic picture. The new Panorama Shooting Mode makes it easy to create impressive panoramic photos 

2.7-inch, high-resolution LCD Rounding out the FinePix S1000fd’s powerful feature set is a large, 2.7-inch high-resolution (230k pixel) LCD plus electronic viewfinder (EVF) and ISO levels of up to ISO 1600 at full resolution and ISO 3200 at 3-megapixel resolution. 

Picture Stabilization mode in action Picture Stabilization mode A selectable mode, Picture Stabilization uses the heightened sensitivity of the FinePix S1000fd and high-speed shutter settings to reduce blur caused by hand-shake or subject movement. It allows the camera to automatically choose the correct light sensitivity and optimal shutter speed to produce clear, blur-free images. 

Full manual photographic control Photo enthusiasts and advanced photographers have total control with manual adjustment options for various camera settings including resolution, ISO, aperture, shutter speed and more. 

5x zoom vs. 12x zoom 12x optical zoom FinePix S1000fd's 12x optical zoom lens expands your shooting reach, covering a remarkable focal range of 33-396mm*, bringing you close enough to capture subtle expressions. And the single built-in lens means you're always ready to shoot, with no need for bulky extra lenses or time-consuming lens changes. 

High-speed shooting Capture the action with the High Speed Shooting mode: 7.5 fps at 2MP for 15 shots; 3.3 fps at 5MP for 6 shots; and 1.4 fps at 10MP for 3 shots. 

Movie recording VGA quality at 30 frames per second with sound. 

14 Pre-programmed Scene Modes The FinePix S1000fd features 14 pre-programmed scene modes that offer a one-touch setting for almost any situation, including: Portrait, Landscape, Sport, Night, Fireworks, Sunset, Snow, Beach, Museum, Party, Flower, Text. 

xD/SD/SDHC-compatible slot The FinePix S1000fd features an xD/SD-compatible slot, which accepts not only Fujifilm’s traditional xD-Picture Cards but also Secure Digital (SD) and SD-High Capacity/SDHC cards too. 

Operates on 4 AA batteries The ultimate in convenience and accessibility, using AA batteries means that, in a pinch, more batteries are just moments away.
feature_bullets: 10-megapixel sensor captures enough detail for photo-quality 18 x 24-inch prints
Face Detection with Automatic Red Eye Removal
Stores images on xD or SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
